optionGroup.prompt:
---------------------------- Set Up the ESM Administrator ---------------------------- At any time type "quit" to quit. Press "<" to go to the previous step.
This step lets you create the ESM administrative user account.

----------------------------- Set Up the ESM HTTPS Listener ----------------------------- At any time type "quit" to quit. Press "<" to go to the previous step.
This step lets you configure the ESM server.
Configuration of Server Settings is optional. If you choose not to configure the server settings, then the following defaults will be used:
- HTTPS Listener IP Address : * (all) - HTTPS Listener Port : 8182

option.name: ESM Username
option.prompt: Enter the ESM administrative user (3-128 characters).

option.name: ESM Password
option.prompt: Enter the ESM administrative password (6-32 characters).

option.name: Server IP Address
option.prompt: Enter the IP address for the HTTPS listener.

option.name: Server Port
option.prompt: Enter the port for the HTTPS listener (1024-65535).
